about_the_game:
Digital Soundtrack - The Original Soundtrack for Blair Witch. Composed by Arkadiusz Reikowski, this music will make you fear the woods.

Immerse yourself in the disturbing atmosphere of the Black Hills Forest with these digital extras.

Track List:

01. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - The Missing Boy
02. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Into The Woods
03. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Prologue
04. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Search Party
05. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - The White Tree
06. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Dreams (feat. Andrzej Janicki)
07. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - The Scent
08. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - I Am Here But You_re Not
09. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Sheriff
10. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - VHS
11. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Use The Flashlight
12. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Fog
13. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Bullet
14. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Carver
15. Blair Witch Original Soundtrack - Arkadiusz Reikowski - Where Are You (feat. Peter Klett _ Brunon Lubas)

name: Blair Witch Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.30 GHz) / AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (3.2 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

usk.descriptors:
Explicit Violence
Shock and/or Horror Content

short_description: The Original Soundtrack for Blair Witch. Composed by Arkadiusz Reikowski, this music will make you fear the woods.
